content.rendered:
Weiz-Unterfladnitz Airport in Weiz, Austria Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address : Unterfladnitz 99, 8181 Unterfladnitz, Austria

Phone : +43 3178 2545

Email id: NA

Hours: End of March to end of October
On weekends (Saturday – Sunday) and on public holidays 0900 – 1900
April to June also on Fridays

Weiz-Unterfladnitz Airport Official website: http://www.logw.at/

Direction: View direction here

IATA code: 

ICAO code: LOGW

Services / Facilities at Weiz-Unterfladnitz Airport

  • Gas Station
  • Canteen
  • Hotel

Canteen

For any services of food, please contact the below

Canteen Telephone: +43 (0) 3178/2545

Canteen opening times:
March – Saturday, Sunday: 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.
April to July – Friday, Saturday, Sunday: 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.
July to October – Saturday, Sunday: 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.

List of Airports in Austria

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Weiz-Unterfladnitz Airport in Weiz, Austria Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Weiz-Unterfladnitz Airport in Weiz Austria: (click on the stars below)

Updated on 20/05/21
